desc_content.paragraph: Responsible for loading and enforcing rules
Add new rules to the Rules object
Verifies that the action is valid on the target in this context.

list_item.paragraph: action – String representing the action to be checked
target – Dictionary representing the object of the action.

field_body.paragraph: A non-False value if access is allowed.

desc_content.paragraph: Check if the given context is associated with an admin role, as defined via the ‘context_is_admin’ RBAC rule.

field_body.paragraph: A non-False value if context role is admin.

target – Dictionary representing the object of the action.
